lead_paragraph: As his personal collection goes on display at a Japanese museum, the artist describes what it’s like to be on the other side of the transaction.

headline.print_headline: Takashi Murakami on the Art of Collecting Art
headline.main: Takashi Murakami on the Art of Collecting Art
